name: Astro Kitten
description:
###You are an astronaut kitten in space.
 With this project I wanted to test unconventional movements, play around zeroG-like momentum on rotations and accellerations, and rendering stuff like adaptive camera zoom.
instructions: <kbd>W</kbd> to propel yourself toward the current kitten direction, <kbd>A</kbd> to rotate counter-clockwise and <kbd>D</kbd> to rotate clockwise.
